name: Breaded Fried Cauliflower
author: Asli   Ocak
summary: Cauliflower dipped in bread crumbs and fried. Delightful. Serve with yogurt.
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, cored and cut into small florets
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine cauliflower and lemon juice in a saucepan; add enough water to cover
Cook until just tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Drain and let cool, about 10 minutes
Beat eggs in a bowl until smooth
Mix bread crumbs, salt, and pepper in a shallow bowl
Dredge each cauliflower floret in flour, dip in eggs, and coat with bread crumbs
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan
Fry cauliflower until golden brown, 2 to 4 minutes
